import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const history = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, [dispatch, id]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history(`/cart/${id}?qty=${qty}`) } return ( <> Go Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
